message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this offer before inflation eats your share!
Let's split fairly, 60-40 is a good deal!
The longer this goes on, the less your share will be worth, Bob. I'm feeling generous, so take this offer!
Come on, Alice, meet me halfway! We're both losing out if we keep going.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it - but remember, your share shrinks with every round!
